references.paper_title: Algorithmic learning in a random world
references.reason: This foundational text introduces conformal prediction, a core concept upon which this paper builds.
This paper introduces Venn-Abers calibration, a key component of the proposed self-calibrating conformal prediction method.

references.paper_title: The limits of distribution-free conditional predictive inference
references.reason: This paper explores the theoretical limits of conditional predictive inference, providing crucial context for the paper's approach.
This recent work provides theoretical underpinnings for conditional conformal prediction, which is directly relevant to the paper's contributions.
This paper offers a distribution-free framework for regression predictive inference, a critical foundation for the proposed methodology.
